reporter_caption.center: CINCINNATI ENQUIRER v. JONES-KELLEY, 116 Ohio St.3d 1447 (2007)

caption.center: State ex rel. Cincinnati Enquirer v. Jones-Kelley.

opinion.opinion_text:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS
This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus.
It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that this case is scheduled for oral argument on Tuesday, January 8, 2008.
